thread.title: GM Results: No Need to Check Engine Light
thread.title_full: GM Results: No Need to Check Engine Light - WSJ

author: Justin Lahart
title: GM Results: No Need to Check Engine Light
text:
It is hard to see the environment for General Motors getting much better than it is now. But for investors, even a little better might be more than enough.
GM on Wednesday reported that it earned 86 cents a share in the third quarter. That was even with a year earlier, despite heavy charges associated with its ignition-switch problems. Excluding those charges and other items, the company earned $1.50 a share, well above the $1.18...
